title: Melvindale- Beautiful 1 Bedroom 1 Bath Unit Available Now!
posting_body: Come view this beautifully updated and modern, 1 bedroom, 1 bath apartment!
This unit boasts modern white cabinets, granite countertops, stainless-steel appliances in the kitchen, and subway tiling.
This spacious apartment is located in the beautiful Melvindale Square Apartment complex which features on-site laundry and off-street parking.
Conveniently located on a quiet street in Melvindale.
-Modern Kitchen with White Cabinets, Subway Tiling, & Granite Countertops
-Stainless-Steel Appliances Include: Refrigerator, Dishwasher, Oven, & Microwave
For more information or to schedule an appointment for showing call
Also enjoy features such as online rent payment, online maintenance requests, and online applications.
Cities close by Dearborn, Dearborn Heights, Allen Park, Lincoln Park, & Taylor.
